text: William David Lowery (born May 2, 1947) is an American politician and lobbyist. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was a member of the U.S. House of Representatives for California's 41st congressional district from 1981 to 1993."Close ties make Rep. Lewis, lobbyist Lowery a potent pair", San Diego Union-Tribune 2005-12-23 by Jerry Kammer ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from California Category:Politicians from San Diego Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Bill Lowery (politician)
